mapper.select: select mr.id as matter_id,mr.record_id as matter_code, '设备维修' as matter_type, 'devices_maintenance' as matter_type_code, mr.record_name as matter_name,mr.pending_person as submitter, mr.create_time as submit_time from t_maintenance_record mr where mr.pending_person_id = #{id} and mr.flow_status_code != 'em_end' UNION select cr.id as matter_id, cr.record_id as matter_code,'耗材申请' as matter_type, 'consumables_collect' as matter_type_code, cr.record_name as matter_name,cr.applicant as submitter, cr.create_time as submit_time from t_collection_record cr where cr.pending_person_id = #{id} and cr.asset_type_code='asset_type_consumables' and cr.flow_status_code!='ccr_end' UNION select cr.id as matter_id, cr.record_id as matter_code,'工具申请' as matter_type, 'tools_collect' as matter_type_code, cr.record_name as matter_name,cr.applicant as submitter, cr.create_time as submit_time from t_collection_record cr where cr.pending_person_id = #{id} and cr.asset_type_code='asset_type_tool' and cr.flow_status_code!='tcr_end' UNION select ip.id as matter_id,CONCAT(REPLACE (ip.inspection_time,'-',''),ip.id) as matter_code, '设备巡检' as matter_type, 'devices_inspection' as matter_type_code, CONCAT(ip.room_name,'巡检') as matter_name,ip.inspector as submitter, ip.inspection_time as submit_time from t_inspection_plan ip where ip.inspector_id = #{id} and 0 =(select count(1) from t_inspection_record ir where ir.plan_id = ip.id)
